teams.name: Paying It Forward
teams.loan_because: We feel our lives have benefitted from the generosity of others and want to "Pay It Forward' by helping others through Kiva loans.  Join us if you want to return some favours to the world.
teams.description: The cost of one 'dinner out for two' is enough for people working their way out of poverty to have the chance to improve their lives. Repaid loans can continue to be relent over and over into the future, helping many hundreds in our lifetimes.
